trans-unit.source: Pick a category and highlight its items, enhance customer experience with a lively homepage.
trans-unit.target: Pick a category and highlight its items, enhance customer experience with a lively homepage.

trans-unit.source: The number of products is invalid. Please enter a positive number.
trans-unit.target: The number of products is invalid. Please enter a positive number.

trans-unit.source: The category ID is invalid. Please choose an existing category ID.
trans-unit.target: The category ID is invalid. Please choose an existing category ID.

trans-unit.source: To add products to your homepage, simply add them to the corresponding product category (default: "Home").
trans-unit.target: To add products to your homepage, simply add them to the corresponding product category (default: "Home").

trans-unit.source: Number of products to be displayed
trans-unit.target: Number of products to be displayed

trans-unit.source: Set the number of products that you would like to display on homepage (default: 8).
trans-unit.target: Set the number of products that you would like to display on homepage (default: 8).

trans-unit.source: Category from which to pick products to be displayed
trans-unit.target: Category from which to pick products to be displayed

trans-unit.source: Enable if you wish the products to be displayed randomly (default: no).
trans-unit.target: Enable if you wish the products to be displayed randomly (default: no).
